thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 24 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Learning Technologies Group Announces Proposed Acquisition Of Peoplefluent

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Learning Technologies Group Announces Proposed Acquisition Of Peoplefluent

organizations.name: brief-learning technologies group announces proposed acquisition of peoplefluent

text:
Learning Technologies Group PLC :
* PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF PEOPLEFLUENT FOR $150 MILLION * CONSIDERATION AND TRANSACTION COSTS FOR ACQUISITION ARE INTENDED TO BE FUNDED BY PLACING OF NEW SHARES RAISING ABOUT £80 MILLION
* CONSIDERATION, TRANSACTION COSTS FOR ACQUISITION INTENDED TO BE FUNDED UP TO C.$48 MILLION (C.£35 MILLION) IN INCREMENTAL DEBT FINANCING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
